messages.message:
Hi Team,
I've noticed that when I enter a description in the Derived Field("Cover Basis Mapping in Email class") section, the text often exceeds the size of the provided text input box.

Project link : https://axa-uk.aihub.instabase.com/build/019782f7-683e-7e46-9a75-201db459992d

cc : @Nithin @Pritam Roy @Saikat
How large can your prompt be, roughly? Is this causing any issues in the accuracy @Prasad?
It is not related to the accuracy issues Saikat, just worrying about the UI issues, it's really difficult writing prompts in Derived Fields.

Yeah understood, it's not ideal and worth raising.

But a couple of ways that we will also try is:
• The cleaning prompt doesn't have the limit
• I'll set the enable original llm limit as well -- but I don't think it will help with the UI/UX constraint, it helps with completeness
Let's discuss in our sync up and we'll report the findings here.

Just a random thought based on some past UI bugs:
@Prasad Does reducing the Chrome browser zoom level to 90% or 70% help?
Actually, this issue is a rare occurrence. If I encounter this behavior again, I’ll try the approach you suggested, Pritam.

Thanks. Yeah +1 to what Pritam mentioned.

But worth noting about the warning about 1000 characters as well Prasad, I was under the impression it was causing issues in terms of the output as well.
